title: Novartis ' spending on research and development by segment 2017 to 2019
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 3 different Companys on X-axis for 3 groups 2017, 2018, and 2019. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Expenditure in billion USD.
In Company Innovative Medicines, 2019 had the highest Expenditure in billion USD 815.0 among the 3 groups and in Alcon, 2019 had the lowest Expenditure in billion USD 0.0.
Among all the Companys, 2019 had the highest Expenditure in billion USD in Company Innovative Medicines and lowest Expenditure in billion USD in Company Alcon.
There is a gap of 815.0 between the highest and lowest Expenditure in billion USD found for 2019 in Company Innovative Medicines and Alcon.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Expenditure in billion USD on the Y-axis for 3 different Companys for 3 groups 2017, 2018, and 2019 that are presented on the X-axis.
Company Innovative Medicines had the maximum Expenditure in billion USD among all 3 groups, and it was for 2019. The minimum Expenditure in billion USD was observed in Company Alcon for 2019.

In Company Innovative Medicines, 2019 had the highest Expenditure in billion USD 815.0 among the 3 groups and in Alcon, 2019 had the lowest Expenditure in billion USD 0.0.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Expenditure in billion USD on the Y-axis for 3 different Companys for 3 groups 2017, 2018, and 2019 that are presented on the X-axis.
In Company Innovative Medicines, 2019 had the highest Expenditure in billion USD 815.0 among the 3 groups and in Alcon, 2019 had the lowest Expenditure in billion USD 0.0.
In Company Innovative Medicines, 2019 had the highest Expenditure in billion USD among all 3 Companys and it has the lowest Expenditure in billion USD in Company Alcon.
The maximum Expenditure in billion USD for 2019 that was found in Company Innovative Medicines was 0 times larger than the minimum Expenditure in billion USD observed in Company Alcon.
Among all 3 groups, 2018 had the gap of 709.0 between the maximum and minimum Expenditure in billion USD observed in Company Innovative Medicines and Alcon respectively.

In Company Innovative Medicines, 2019 had the highest Expenditure in billion USD 815.0 among the 3 groups and in Alcon, 2019 had the lowest Expenditure in billion USD 0.0. The second highest Expenditure in billion USD 768.0 was observed for 2019 in Company Innovative Medicines.
On average, the Company Innovative Medicines had the highest Expenditure in billion USD for all 3 groups 2017, 2018, and 2019. Whereas Alcon had the lowest average Expenditure in billion USD.
